title: Uchi no Maid ga Uzasugiru!
original_name: うちのメイドがウザすぎる！
opening_song: "Uza Uza☆Wows! (ウザウザ ☆ わおーっす！)" by Misha Takanashi (Haruka Shiraishi) & Tsubame Kamoi (Manami Numakura)
ending_song: "Tokimeki☆Climax (ときめき ☆ くらいまっくす)" by Misha Takanashi (Haruka Shiraishi) & Tsubame Kamoi (Manami Numakura)
sinopse: Having lost her mother at a young age, Misha Takanashi, a second grader who is half-Russian and half-Japanese, now lives with her Japanese father. Tsubame Kamoi, formerly a Japan Air Self-Defense Force, JASDF officer, comes to the Takanashi household as a housekeeper. This is a home comedy where Kamoi, a hardcore lolicon, attempts to get near Misha as she tries to fight against her.
